document.full_text: after building an early lead, the yankees left another capacity crowd exasperated with their continued lackluster play, as they were swept by the red sox and lost their fifth straight game.
document.title: red sox 7, yankees 5: tensions are smoothed over, but yankees are still swept
lines_and_colors: after building an early lead, the yankees left another capacity crowd exasperated with their continued lackluster play, as they were swept by the red sox and lost their fifth straight game.
